summary: Test suite that validates the OptimizeAnnotated transpiler pass, checking that swap‑before‑measure optimizations and other annotated operation transformations are applied correctly and only when appropriate, while respecting modifiers, conditional branches, and custom gate definitions.
business_intent: Guarantee the correctness and reliability of quantum circuit optimizations in the Qiskit compiler by ensuring that annotated operations are handled safely, preventing unintended circuit alterations and supporting robust quantum software development.
